title: Can't log in
body:
First it says there was an unexpected error, then it gets stuck on 'Authenticating...'


EDIT: Restarted, now it works... why? 0_o

replies.body: Did this only happen once or are you intermittently seeing this issue occur?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EE9kpXdo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-13T22:21:25.786+0000)
>
> Did this only happen once or are you intermittently seeing this issue occur?

Second time, I believe.

Gotcha. There could be some inconsistencies in your connection to our login servers. I'd recommend [**configuring your network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for League in order to prevent this from happening again.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EE9kpXdo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-14T22:57:29.853+0000)
>
> Gotcha. There could be some inconsistencies in your connection to our login servers. I'd recommend [**configuring your network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for League in order to prevent this from happening again.
> 
> Please let me know if you have any questions.

Alright, thanks.
